name: vEmployee
overview:
vEmployee is a leading IT Service provider for small & medium enterprises and entrepreneurs. With services spanning over the technology value chain, vEmployee is a one stop shop for enterprise wide IT needs.

vEmployee has established itself as a trusted partner to various companies by providing timely project delivery coupled with high quality. Our parent organization Clarion Technologies is a SEI CMMi Level 3 assessed company whose singular focus is on client satisfaction.

vEmployee recruit and retain leading Developers So that the client can concentrate on their core business without worrying about the productivity issues that eat into a management’s time.

Quick Facts about vEmployee:

>10+ years of Industrial Experience. >Winner of Skype Developer Competition. >Experience of delivering 300+ successful Projects. >3 State-of-The-Art Development Centers with 24X7 availability, security systems with access control and telecommunications network >Rich Talent Pool of 250+ expert developers. >Clients ranging from Fortune 5000 companies to funded start ups. >93% of business from repeat clients.
